ServerRequest

This component is used to request the application specified by the data input [In]app from the server specified by the data input [In]server on the port specified by the data input [In]port.

Ports

  • [In] port:

  • [In] app:

  • [In] server:

  • [In] :

  • [Out] :

  • [Out] err:

  • [Out] err:

EDIT - list of tags available to link to the ports for the component in the HTML: [In]port, [In]app, [In]server, [In], [Out], [Out]err, [Out]err,

Parameters

  • Port:

    TCP/IP port number

    Data Type:

    I,

    Min Value:

    1,

    Max Value:

    65535,

    Default Value:

    11426

  • Application Name:

    Server IP

    Data Type:

    S,

    Min Value:

    Application to request,

    Max Value:

    None,

    Default Value:

    [Parameter3]

  • Server IP:


    Data Type:

    S,

    Min Value:

    Server IP addres,

    Max Value:

    None,

    Default Value:

    None

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

  • Media:

Toolbox

GUI/Level1.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:
